ygData.subject: Re: Selling a Bone Bladed Claymore & some archery stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I have yet to actually find an arrow or fletching shop in Freeport. I was informed by a friend that there was one, but i have yet to find it, and he couldnt
ygData.messageBody:
I have yet to actually find an arrow or fletching shop in Freeport. I
was informed by a friend that there was one, but i have yet to find it,
and he couldnt remember exactly where it was.
So i had a friend in the Qeynos area stop by Surefall and pick up the
components for me.
Gotta do what ya gotta do.

Cya in-game
Bathory
Cazic-Thule

--- ken <brooksc@...> wrote:
> From: "ken" <brooksc@...>
>
>
>
>
> Im just letting you guys know that im selling a Bone
> Bladed Claymore so give
> me a /tell if your interested. Also Bathory can you
> tell me where in
> freeport where we can buy arrows? or the fletching
> materials there?
>
> I have a rough recurve ash bow(I think something
> like that) and it does
> 14dmg and im wondering if there are stronger bows
> out there.
>
>
> Trian Soulreaper
> Human Shadowknight of Cazic Thule
